segments.text: Would you mind if I make a suggestion ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe you should try to quit smoking . You know it is very bad for your health .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , sure it is . Actually , I have been cutting down the amount since two months ago . I used to smoke a pack of cigarettes for a single day . Now I limit it to 6 cigarettes a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You have made a big progress . Quitting smoking is not an easy job . But it will be rewarding in the long run .
segments.speaker: S1
